MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer, affecting properties in Church Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 7:21am. Our next available engineer will attend site and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:49am on Tuesday, 24 November 2020
